channel.title: Revoltpk
channel.description:
Ever wanted a great HD server with minimal lag, unforeseen content, and incredibly active developers creating updates everyday, without hesitation to listen to your ideas and turn them into something magnificent?
Then RevoltPK is for you!
This server includes All working bosses. all minigames work properly (any original minigame works fully as if you were playing rs) We even have a few qaulity custom minigames. Many custom bosses, and npcs. Very Creative events and quest for players to enjoy. Portal for teleporting to areas, or you can just use the teleport commands! Flawless prestige system, combined with the pk system. Killstreaks, and magnificent killstreak rewards perfect combat system, and switching for hybrids. Absolute qaulity shops, with A perfect Pkshop and Voteshop. vote system fully working. Webclient fully working. Great hosting, forums and website. http://revoltpk.com/index.html [img]http://i.imgur.com/bE8NOtw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YBbn334.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/v7Of6he.png[/img] item.title: Revoltpk
item.dc:creator: @noga213 noga213
item.description:
@noga213 wrote:

Ever wanted a great HD server with minimal lag,
unforeseen content, and incredibly active developers creating updates everyday,
without hesitation to listen to your ideas and turn them into something magnificent?

Then RevoltPK is for you!

This server includes
All working bosses.
all minigames work properly (any original minigame works fully as if you were playing rs)
We even have a few qaulity custom minigames.
Many custom bosses, and npcs.
Very Creative events and quest for players to enjoy.
Portal for teleporting to areas, or you can just use the teleport commands!
Flawless prestige system, combined with the pk system.
Killstreaks, and magnificent killstreak rewards
perfect combat system, and switching for hybrids.
Absolute qaulity shops, with A perfect Pkshop and Voteshop.
vote system fully working.
Webclient fully working.
Great hosting, forums and website.
http://revoltpk.com/index.html
